Experience the tranquility and adventure of Kashmir with our Kashmir tour package from Lucknow. Discover the wonders of this magical destination.

Looking to escape from Lucknow to the serene beauty of Kashmir? Our detailed tour package offers a seamless blend of majestic landscapes, rich culture, and thrilling adventures. Whether you prefer flying, taking a train, or driving, we’ve got all the options covered for a smooth journey.

Why Choose Kashmir for Your Next Vacation?

Kashmir, often called “Heaven on Earth,” boasts stunning landscapes of snow-capped mountains, lush valleys, and shimmering lakes. It’s not just a visual delight but also a haven for peace and adventure. The region’s vibrant culture and warm hospitality make it a perfect getaway for relaxation and excitement.

For those planning a Kashmir Vacation from Lucknow, this region promises an unforgettable experience when you are looking for a family, adventure, honeymoon or a romantic package from Lucknow.

Highlights of Our Kashmir Tour Packages from Lucknow: Flexible Transportation Options

Traveling from Lucknow to Kashmir can be done by various modes of transport, depending on your preferences. Here are the main ways you can travel:

1. By Air

  • Lucknow to Srinagar: The fastest way to reach Kashmir from Lucknow is by air. You can take a direct or connecting flight from Lucknow’s Chaudhary Charan Singh International Airport (LKO) to Srinagar International Airport (SXR).
    • Flight Duration: 2-3 hours (direct), but some flights may have layovers, extending the total time.
    • Airlines: Indigo, Air India, GoAir, and others operate flights between these cities.
  •  Booking Links
    • IndiGo
    • SpiceJet
    • GoAir
    • Air India

2. By Train + Road

  • There is no direct train from Lucknow to Srinagar. However, you can take a train from Lucknow to Jammu Tawi (JAT), and then travel to Srinagar by road.
    • Step 1: Take a train from Lucknow to Jammu. The journey takes approximately 18-22 hours depending on the train.
      • Some popular trains are Himgiri Express and Jhelum Express.
    • Step 2: From Jammu, you can hire a taxi, take a bus, or rent a vehicle to reach Srinagar. The road journey from Jammu to Srinagar takes about 7-8 hours and passes through scenic mountain terrain.
  • Booking Links
    • Indian Railways
    • Redbus

3. By Bus + Road

  • You can take a bus or drive your car from Lucknow to Jammu (around 18-20 hours) and then continue from Jammu to Srinagar by road. Alternatively, there are luxury bus services from Jammu to Srinagar.
    • Bus Route: Lucknow → Jammu → Srinagar.
  • Booking Links for Taxis and Buses
    • Redbus

Recommended Route

  • By Air: Lucknow to Srinagar by flight for the fastest and most convenient option.
  • By Train + Road: For a scenic, more immersive travel experience, the train to Jammu and road to Srinagar is an option many travelers enjoy.

Detailed Itinerary

Day 1: Arrival in Srinagar

  • Welcome at Srinagar Airport
  • Transfer to a luxurious houseboat on Dal Lake
  • Evening Shikara ride on the lake
  • Overnight stay in the houseboat

Day 2: Srinagar City Tour

  • Visit the famous Mughal Gardens: Shalimar Bagh, Nishat Bagh, and Chashme Shahi
  • Tour the old city and explore local crafts markets
  • Overnight in Srinagar hotel

Day 3: Excursion to Gulmarg

  • Scenic drive to Gulmarg known for its beautiful landscapes and ski resorts
  • Gondola ride to Apharwat Peak
  • Optional skiing or snowboarding
  • Return to Srinagar for the night

Day 4: Pahalgam Sightseeing

  • Drive to Pahalgam, a picturesque town on the Lidder River
  • Visit local sites like Betaab Valley and Aru Valley
  • Enjoy local activities like horse riding or trekking
  • Stay overnight in Pahalgam

Day 5: Visit to Sonamarg

  • Day trip to Sonamarg, the “Meadow of Gold”
  • Activities like pony rides to Thajiwas Glacier
  • Return to Srinagar for overnight stay

Day 6: Departure

  • Transfer to the airport for your return flight to Lucknow

FAQs

What is the best time to visit Kashmir for adventure activities?

The ideal time to visit Kashmir for adventure activities is from March to October for summer activities and December to February for winter sports.

Are there any safety precautions for adventure activities in Kashmir?

Yes, it is essential to follow safety guidelines provided by instructors and guides, wear appropriate gear, and be aware of weather conditions.

Can beginners try adventure activities in Kashmir?

Absolutely! Kashmir offers a range of activities suitable for beginners, including skiing, trekking, and rafting with professional guidance.

What should I pack for an adventure trip to Kashmir?

Pack appropriate clothing for the season, sturdy shoes, safety gear for specific activities, and essential items like sunscreen, a first-aid kit, and a water bottle.

Are there any restrictions for adventure activities in Kashmir?

Certain activities may have age or health restrictions. It’s best to check with the activity providers for specific requirements.
